amendment.description: Amendment sought to give public housing agencies the discretion not to implement family self-sufficiency agreement requirements unless sufficient funds are appropriated to cover the costs of such implementation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make discretionary, rather than mandatory, the bill's requirement that public housing tenants sign self-sufficiency contracts unless funds are specifically appropriated each year for the purpose of implementing such contracts by the housing authorities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 253 (Roll no. 104).
